Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' - 'The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades'
MemoryInfobox.location: Barren Pond, The Scorched Lands, the Underworld

General_Description: '''Round and Round''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''[[Ixion]] was a murderer. He broke every rule of hospitality when he killed his guests and tried to seduce none other than the [[Hera|wife]] of [[Zeus]]. The god of thunder ultimately struck him down, tying poor Ixion to an eternally spinning wheel. Go northwest to find me near the blazing fire pit.''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades]]''
